summary: The 'CDFI Fund Transparency Act' (S. 2704) aims to increase transparency and accountability regarding the operations of the Community Development Financial Institutions (CDFI) Fund. The bill mandates the Secretary of the Treasury, or a designee, to annually testify before the Senate Committee on Banking, Housing, and Urban Affairs and the House Committee on Financial Services, at their discretion, concerning the Fund's activities during the prior fiscal year.
